content:
The Staples Center in LA is primarily a basketball and hockey arena, and it doesn't typically host tennis events. However, there are other venues in the Los Angeles area that do host tennis tournaments and events.

One notable venue is the Los Angeles Tennis Center at UCLA, which has hosted several high-profile tennis tournaments, including the ATP Tour and WTA Tour events. The Indian Wells Tennis Garden in Indian Wells, California, is another popular venue that hosts the BNP Paribas Open, a prestigious ATP Masters 1000 and WTA Premier Mandatory event.

Additionally, the Southern California Tennis Association (SCTA) and the United States Tennis Association (USTA) often host various tennis tournaments and events throughout the year, which might be of interest to you.

If you're looking to attend a live tennis event, I recommend checking the schedules and websites of these venues or organizations to see what's coming up. You can also keep an eye on the ATP and WTA Tour schedules to see when top players like Djokovic might be competing in the LA area.

Remember to plan ahead, as popular tennis events can sell out quickly, and it's always exciting to watch live tennis with a great atmosphere!
